description:
It is a 3D variation of nonograms/picross. 

* 256 puzzles
* 20 dioramas
* Procedurally generated puzzles
name: Voxelgram
intro: Voxelgram is a relaxing 3D puzzle game where you sculpture models by following logical hints. No guessing involved, only deduction and dioramas made out of solved puzzles!
